abstract.t: This document defines a R2 package in association with the MEGACO Protocol that can be used to control a Media Gateway (MG) from an external controller, called a Media Gateway controller (MGC). The document is organised into the following major sections: * Introduction to R2 signalling * Definition of R2 package with brief description of the Events and signals in the package. * Different call flow scenarios where R2 signalling is used on either one end or both ends. Scenarios with multiple MGCs are also considered.
